title: Authors and Citation
text: Palate J (2024). rjd3stl: R Interface 'JDemetra+ 3.x' Seasonal Adjustment Software. R package version 2.1.1, https://rjdemetra.github.io/rjd3stl/, https://github.com/jdemetra/rjd3stl.

what: R Interface to JDemetra+ 3.x Seasonal Adjustment Software
title: R Interface to JDemetra+ 3.x Seasonal Adjustment Software
text: R interface giving access STL (Loess based time series decomposition) implemented JDemetra+ v3.x.

title: R Interface to JDemetra+ 3.x Seasonal Adjustment Software
text: Running rjd3 packages requires Java 17 higher. set configuration R explained get current stable version (latest release): get current development version GitHub:

title: R Interface to JDemetra+ 3.x Seasonal Adjustment Software
text: contribution welcome done pull requests /issues. pull requests include updated tests updated documentation. functionality changed, docstrings added updated.

title: R Interface to JDemetra+ 3.x Seasonal Adjustment Software
text: code project licensed European Union Public Licence (EUPL).

title: Title — istl
code: istl(   y,   periods,   multiplicative = TRUE,   swindows = NULL,   twindows = NULL,   ninnerloop = 1,   nouterloop = 15,   nojump = FALSE,   weight.threshold = 0.001,   weight.function = c("BIWEIGHT", "UNIFORM", "TRIANGULAR", "EPANECHNIKOV", "TRICUBE",     "TRIWEIGHT") )

title: Title — mstl
code: mstl(   y,   periods,   multiplicative = TRUE,   swindows = NULL,   twindow = 0,   ninnerloop = 1,   nouterloop = 15,   nojump = FALSE,   weight.threshold = 0.001,   weight.function = c("BIWEIGHT", "UNIFORM", "TRIANGULAR", "EPANECHNIKOV", "TRICUBE",     "TRIWEIGHT") )

title: Title — stlplus
text: Perform STL like (based Loess) decomposition periodicity

title: Title — stlplus
code: stlplus(   y,   period,   multiplicative = TRUE,   swindow = 7,   twindow = 0,   lwindow = 0,   sdegree = 0,   tdegree = 1,   ldegree = 1,   sjump = 0,   tjump = 0,   ljump = 0,   ninnerloop = 1,   nouterloop = 15,   weight.threshold = 0.001,   weight.function = c("BIWEIGHT", "UNIFORM", "TRIANGULAR", "EPANECHNIKOV", "TRICUBE",     "TRIWEIGHT"),   legacy = FALSE )

title: Title — stlplus
text: y input time series. period period, positive real number. multiplicative Boolean indicating decomposition mode multiplicative (TRUE). swindow length seasonal filter. twindow length trend filter. lwindow length filter used remove trend seasonal sdegree degree seasonal local polynomial (0 1) tdegree degree trend local polynomial (0 1) ldegree degree low-pass local polynomial (0 1) sjump number jumps computation seasonal tjump number jumps computation trend ljump number jumps computation trend seasonal ninnerloop Number inner loops nouterloop Number outer loops (computation robust weights) weight.threshold Weights threshold ([0, 0.3]) weight.function weights function legacy use (bugged) legacy MAD

title: Title — stlplus
text: matrix following series: y, sa, t, s, , fit, weights
